short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark mode, analytics, add LinkedIn friends. Next release: add ùïè followers, DM for PH.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Version 1.0 features (this version):
-Product Hunt is full of founders wanting to connect on LinkedIn. Use Upperhunt to speed up your connection process.
-Go to Upperhunt.com to visualize your Product Hunt growth (analytics). Focus on actions that are effective for growth.
-Toggle light and dark mode for Product Hunt
-Receive a streak reminder email when the day is nearly over and you haven't yet visited Product Hunt on this browser

Version 2.0 features (next release):
-Automate the process of getting ùïè followers from Product Hunt
-DM (messaging)
-Gain more visibility for your startup. Upperhunt will provide features that are specifically designed to make your product seen by other Upperhunters.
-Product fan page
